title: Guilt
description: Riley Hawthorne is more worried about sneaking out and kissing boys than she is about her future. So when her parents enlist a young priest, who is new to town, to help tame her promiscuous ways, secrets about her family begin to unravel.Caught between a crooked cop and his rebellious stepdaughter, Aiden Donovan tries to do what he can to help set her life on the right path. But, as he delves deeper into their world of corruption and becomes entangled with those who have done her wrong, the line between atonement and revenge begins to blur.It isn’t long before Riley discovers Aiden Donovan isn’t your typical priest, and he is hiding a dark past of his own, one that will destroy them all if his secrets ever come to light.CONTAINS: PRIEST, AGE GAPGuilt is a novella in the Quick and Dirty Series. If you like a short and sweet story with instalove and a happily ever after, this book is for you. Every book in the series is completely standalone. Be warned – the sex in this is raw and taboo. It is not for the faint of heart. Now dive in, you dirty little kitten.
author: Nova Monroe
